title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Multichain ERC20 @ETHParis 2023 | July 19, 2023 | Paris, FranceEvent Website: https://multichainerc20.com/The benefits of the Ethereum network should be easily accessible and available globally and to everyone with little to no barriers to entry.Multichain ERC20 is about bringing together the greatest and most inspired minds to build the future of web3.We want you to leave seeing a clear path forward and excited about what is to come for Ethereum.Events such as this are where people come together and new ideas are born. If you would like to present, have any thoughts, comments, ideas, or questions please reach out here.

comments.author: S3cco
comments.body: Blockswap Labs, a leading blockchain research lab and protocol solutions provider, is pleased to announce their side event at the highly anticipated ETHCC week in Paris, France, which is scheduled to take place on July 19, 2023. Attendees will have the opportunity to explore the future of web3 and engage with industry leaders.Multichain ERC20, brings together visionaries, developers, investors, and enthusiasts to discuss the latest infrastructure advancements and innovations in Ethereum. Blockswapâ€™s objective at ETHCC is to educate the Ethereum community about decentralizing Ethereum through increased staking optionality and robust security.The Multichain ERC20 event at ETHCC consists of two distinct tracks, each offering unique insights and discussions led by experts in the field:...
